page.title: 07 MY DAY ON THE FARM
page.content: I start my day on the{farm}by helping my dad get the cows in for{milking}. After the cows have been milked, we put them back in the field. The grass in the field feeds the cows so they give more milk.After dad and I have put the cows out,we go to our other farm and feed the young stock.We feed them on hay and calf nuts and give them water to drink.We then go back to the farm to muck out the stables and wash them out so they are clean for the cows to come back in for milking. Our cows have to be milked twice a day. Once in the morning and once in the evening. We also have a{bull}but my dad does him because I am not strong enough to cope with him yet. When all the work on the farm is done, I can go to bed.My farm is called La Fontenelle. By{Adam Le Lacheur.
